Articles.Content:
![jOiXIU1.png](http://i.imgur.com/jOiXIU1.png)

I think he misunderstood when I said: "Plant Flag". He clearly isn't very bright.
At least you can take the flag home with you.
Last flag I planted I immediately ran it over.
I plant a flag inside the control tower on the island near KSC, and it show up on the roof.
Now, that's funny. Although I about lost it the first time I saw you could climb a flag. Need an extra step up to your lander? Plant a flag!
Could have been worse. He could have buried the flag in the hope that it would sprout and grow up to be a really big flag.

Yeah, at least he put it in a pot first.

But seriously, I didn't even know you could plant flags on parts like that. I never tried to do that because I don't keep flags around.

I just plant them and then pick them right back up because I don't like flags cluttering up my Tracking Center view (and they still bug me when I have their visibility turned off).

Then again, I suppose if I ever managed to do a successful Eve return mission I would leave a flag.

You can not only fly the falg, but also make the flag fly.

Steps:

Prepare your Mainsail cannon

![3gjrEIs.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3gjrEIs.jpg)

Obtain a flag

![4NtXJDK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/4NtXJDK.jpg)

Put the flag in the cannon

![B2qV8DQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/B2qV8DQ.jpg)

Profit!

![OXi5HNr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OXi5HNr.jpg)

o\_o

We have all learned something very useful today.
It seems like he wanted to create a fort. Fort Bartford!
